channel.title: Host needed
channel.description:
[b]NEED HELP[/b] I need a host for my 317, it's the my first server and it rules pretty much. So reply if you want to host. WE DON'T NEED VPS! Just to get online everyday You'll get owner spot.
Thanks

item.title: Host needed
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Read the rules,
This shouldnt be here

  1. All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related questions will be locked. Requesting a [size=12pt][font=times new roman]host[/font][/size], ‘coder’/programmer, server or client, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related. That means for other sections on this site too

Read full topic
